mapper.insert: insert into tbl_reply (reply_content, member_id, comment_id) values (#{replyContent}, #{memberId}, #{commentId})
mapper.select: select r.id, r.comment_id, r.member_id, r.reply_content ,r.created_datetime, r.updated_datetime, u.user_name, m.member_profile_url as snsProfile, f.file_path as memberProfileUrl, jc.job_name from tbl_reply r join tbl_member m on r.member_id = m.user_id join tbl_user u on m.user_id = u.id left join tbl_user_job_category ujc on u.id = ujc.user_id left join tbl_job_category jc on ujc.job_category = jc.id left join tbl_user_profile_file upf on u.id = upf.user_id left join tbl_file f on upf.file_id = f.id where r.reply_status = 'active' and r.comment_id = #{commentId} order by r.created_datetime asc
select count(*) from tbl_reply where comment_id = #{commentId} and reply_status = 'active'
